extendedInfo.description: Bharat Agravat is best known for his exceptional work in Painless Cosmetic & Implant dentistry. He provides high quality dental care to people across the world. His aim to improve the quality of life of patients through compassion and dedication.Dr Agravat awarded by Gujarat state governor, home minister & education chairman. Dr Agravat associates with corporate organization O.N.G.C., The Apollo Clinic, The New India Assurance co Ltd; He is a Chairman of Dr Agravat Healthcare Ltd, Managing Trusty of Shree Aum Kareshwar Charitable Trust, former president of Indian Dental Association, MTV Medical Association, member of the American Dental Association and many other professional associations. Dr Agravat gives guidance on live TV Talk show Zee TV, TV 9, All India Radio. We are proud to have put Gujarat on the dental & medical tourism. Visit: http://drbharat.agravat.comDr. Bharat Agravat best cosmetic dentist and top Dental Implant Surgeon Ahmedabad India since 1999          Welcome to painless dentistry. Dr. Bharat Agravat best cosmetic dentist and top Dental Implant Surgeon India since 1999, expert in Cosmetic Dentistry like perfect smile design, teeth whitening, studding diamond, braces, single sitting root canal, replacement of teeth by dental bridge or dental implant, laser oral surgery, flap surgery, bone grafting, wisdom tooth removes, gum disease, mobile tooth treatment, bleed gum, foul smell, kids child dentistry, denture- fix- flexible and metal denture.               Dr Bharat Agravat has fully air-conditioned with ultra modern facilities dental clinic at prime location Ahmedabad Gujarat India. Dr Bharat Agravat carrying the tradition of medical practice of very well known Dr Agravat family, as my father, grandfather and family member was a well-known specialist doctor.               Awarded by (1) Accelerated Dental Learning Center U.S.A. (2) Indian Academy of Aesthetic & Cosmetic Dentistry (3) Gujarat state Governor (4) Home Minister (5) Education Chairman (6) Government Dental Collage & Hospital Dean, Ahmedabad.           Dr Bharat Agravat also former President of Indian Dental Association IDA and MTV Medical Association - Ahmedabad. Affiliate Member of American Dental Association- ADA (USA).             Article Published in Media like The Times of India, Divya Bhaskar, Sandesh, Economic Times, and Abhiyan etc. .Gives Guidance on a talk Show TV9 and ZEE TV and All India Radio.              Associate with corporate organization like Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited-ONGC, Dr. Bharat Agravat is an Empanel Dental Surgeon at ongc dental clinic ahmedabad since 2007.The New India Assurance Company Ltd., Apollo Hospitals clinic, Rogi Kalyan Samiti Government Dental Collage Civil Hospital, Sanjivani Super Specialty Hospital, Shantiniketan Hospital. Visiting consulting dental surgeon to various places like rajkot, veraval, junagadh, mumbai, delhi, chennai, banglore, India.             Dr. Bharat Agravat best dentist implant dental clinic India if you want to know more Visits: www.drbharat.agravat.com Address:                                  Dr Bharat Agravat Cosmetic Dental Implant Clinic.UF-2, Mohini tower, B/S Pride Hotel, Near Judges cross road, s. g. highway,Satellite, prhladnagar, Bodakdev, Ahmedabad - 380054.Gujarat, India.

reviews.comment: This App has given me an instant access to dentist. Features are useful. Good app and very useful. Worked perfectly on my LG Optimus.
